Objective

Experiment with development, training and hyperparameter tuning of multitask, multiclass classification model to classify attributes including sex, race, and age group.

Code

Github Link: https://github.com/nikhil-salodkar/age_prediction

Demo

Live Demo can be tried in Huggingface spaces: https://huggingface.co/spaces/niks-salodkar/Age-Prediction-Demo

Dataset

UTKFace dataset used for training the model which can be found here.
